Desc.eng: Van Helsing! I've rarely felt anything so powerful. It must be one of those magical seals.
They do take strange forms and shapesâ€¦ we can't destroy it then. Not even to save a group of forsaken ghosts.
Still, we can't let those miserable ghosts suffer any more. The totem must be destroyed.
What are you doing? I thought we were going to leave those magical seals alone!
Don't worry. I simply wanted to know how powerful it is. Very much, I have to say.
